name: The King of Melancholy
description: This is the genesis piece that inspired the Monarx collection. Many years ago, in a period of isolation, a vision came to me. A man wearing a crown isolated in a storm of suffering. I was able to evolve my art around this theme over the years until I fleshed out "King of Melancholy". When I showed this piece to my team, we knew it was the beginning of a great collection.
